General.Name: WiSoL CO.LTD
General.Description: WiSoL CO.,LTD. manufactures and sells surface acoustic wave filters, duplexers, and modules in South Korea. It offers single and dual filters; multiplexers; RF modules; and ceramic actuator modules and touch feedback sensors. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Osan-si, South Korea.
